posts.html:
What apple took away I'd like to bring back :)

What is 12 Days of Shipmas?

12 Days of Shipmas is a challenge to ship 12 projects in 12 days during the holiday season. Each day, you build and launch something new.

This site uses the Shipmas Ghost Theme - an open-source advent-style countdown theme for makers and builders.

Learn more here:

Features

Beautiful 12-day countdown grid, dark mode by default, festive snowflake animation, and responsive design.

Get the Theme

This theme is free and open source. Fork it, customize it, and run your own 12 Days of Shipmas!

If you choose to take part, let us know over on x :)
posts.plaintext:
What apple took away I'd like to bring back :)


What is 12 Days of Shipmas?

12 Days of Shipmas is a challenge to ship 12 projects in 12 days during the holiday season. Each day, you build and launch something new.

This site uses the Shipmas Ghost Theme - an open-source advent-style countdown theme for makers and builders.

Learn more here:

The 12 Days of ShipmasWhat apple took away I‚Äôd like to bring back :)humanwritten.aiüçã


Features

Beautiful 12-day countdown grid, dark mode by default, festive snowflake animation, and responsive design.


Get the Theme

This theme is free and open source. Fork it, customize it, and run your own 12 Days of Shipmas!

GitHub - 12-days-of-shipmas-2025/day-1-shipmas-ghost-theme: A Ghost theme featuring a 12 Days of Shipmas countdown grid with dark mode supportA Ghost theme featuring a 12 Days of Shipmas countdown grid with dark mode support - 12-days-of-shipmas-2025/day-1-shipmas-ghost-themeGitHub12-days-of-shipmas

If you choose to take part, let us know over on x :)

i'll mainly use claude code, the üëë of ai coding

(if anyone would like a week pass dm i have 3 available)

and i'll post my updates to this thread + https://t.co/dfPqeIylO1

if you'd like to see some bts / have any questions please feel free to reach out :)

also ft. nano‚Ä¶

‚Äî üçã (@humanwritten_) December 28, 2025
